summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department Commuter Pool Park and Pool Demonstration Program, authorizing the Director of Engineering to acquire rights to use off-street areas for parking vehicles of coming the Director of Engineering to acquire rights to use off-street areas for parking vehicles of commuters who use other forms of transportation to a primary destination; authorizing the execution of agreements, including indemnification covenants in connection therewith, and to develop such areas, and to promulgate reasonable rules and regulations controlling the use of "Park and Pool" Lots established.
